form.title: Quiz
form.subtitle: Create your own interactive quiz!
form.import_classic_tt:
One question per line.
Column 1: question
Columns 2: correct answer
Columns 3,4,5: wrong answers.
form.import_majority_tt:
One question per line.
Column 1: question
Columns 2,3,4,5: wrong answers.
form.import_freeAnswer_tt:
One question per line.
Column 1: question
Column 2: correct answer
form.import_invalid_file: Invalid file format. Please upload a CSV file with the correct structure.
form.premium_limit: You reached the limit of {MAX} quizzes you can create.
form.non_premium_limit:
You reached the limit of {MAX} quiz you can create.
Become a premium member to create up to {MAX_PREMIUM} quizzes.
form.premium_question_limit: You reached the limit of {MAX} questions you can add.
form.nonpremium_question_limit:
You reached the limit of {MAX} questions you can add.
Become a premium to add up to {MAX_PREMIUM} questions.

delete_confirm.description:
Quiz will be deleted
This cannot be undone.
delete_confirm.title: Delete quiz?

form.param_time_based_scoring:
Time-based scoring
(more points for faster answers)
form.param_loose_on_fail:
Lose points on fail
(wrong answers remove points)

mode_classic.title: Classic mode
mode_classic.description:
One question, up to 6 answers, 1 or more correct answers.

Viewers earn points for every correct answers.

mode_freeAnswer.title: Free answer mode
mode_freeAnswer.description: One question, viewers can answer freely from chat or on the Twitchat extension.

mode_majority.title: Majority mode
mode_majority.description:
One question, up to 4 answers answers. ONLY WRONG answers

Viewers must guess which answer will receive the most votes.
